title: Is this legitimate?
selftext: I got an ad for this today but this just sounds like a scam. Has anyone signed up for this? Wouldn't mind winning a scholarship but it just sounds fake
comments: They are giving a free ride to a university. Basically they'll pay for a taxi from what it looks like
